issue.title: [R] Access S3 files by version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13895](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13895). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be very helpful if one could access previous versions of an S3 object using an S3 versionId.  Adding a `?versionId=` to the end of an `s3://` URI is not standard, but all versions are available via the `https://` URIs
